title: Strange Client
body:
Hey,
Yesterday my client was fine and then today there was a small update, didn't think much about it, i accepted and now the client has changed, when i log in there is no background and a different border, when i am in the client it has the old theme and i cannot click on my friends or the notification buttons. I would love to find a fix, thanks.

replies.body:
Hey KWilko1604,

I'm pretty sure repairing your client will do the trick. If you're unsure how to do so, check out the article linked below:

http://www.wrenchmen.org/resources/knowledgebase/1?view=article
